DOC.brief_summary: Safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and early pharmacodynamics of single rising oral doses of BI 1021958 tablets in healthy male volunteers (first-in-human trial)
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Early Pharmacodynamics of Single Rising Oral Doses of BI 1021958 Tablets in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
